scripts.test: pnpm run build && pnpm run --filter pixelmanipulator-node-demo lint
scripts.build: pnpm run --filter pixelmanipulator build && pnpm run --filter pixelmanipulator-web-demo build
scripts.node-demo: pnpm run build && pnpm run --filter pixelmanipulator-node-demo node-demo
scripts.updatedemo: pnpm run build && pnpm run --filter pixelmanipulator updatedemo
